name: Isometric Map Sculptor
description:
This tool is for showcasing potential customers the functionality of a game maker studio asset i made at the marketplace. Yet it can be fun to play with it if you want. 

Isometric map sculptor  puts in your hands a set of powerful tools that allows you to create isometric maps based on tiles. You can use this to add it to your project as a map editor.

Features

  • Land elevation and reduction.
  • Terrain smoothing and leveling.
  • Destroyable terrain. 
  • Manual terrain painting.
  • Automatic painting based on heights (if the terrain is not previously painted), 
  • Add trees / props.
  • Deleate trees/props.
  • Some other small feature.
